About Apartments

Our apartment is located in a calm and cozy private complex in the historical center of the city.


We offer cozy apartments with all the necessary equipment with a high level of comfort. The apartments are located in private territory only for residents, a spacious green backyard, private parking, a mini park where there is a year-round occupation for adults and children.

Apartments and residential features

Nice old arhitecture outside view
Pleasant public courtyards
Comfortable and spacious layout
Cozy living rooms
Pleasant and comfortable bedrooms
Nice interiors and design
Full apartment equipment
Private parking places

About location

Our Coworking is located in the private complex in heart of the city. The building is located in a pleasant sector with a beatiful view of historical old arhitecture and cozy streets and parks.


In this place it will be convenient to stay and spend time, as well as to get to any point of the city in the shortest possible time.
